item.description:
Entrain: rock-blues-calypso-ska-zydeco-jazz-funk, based around the drums and infectious rhythms - a New England favorite!

  Click here to listen!

Music By the Sea:  Kick back with your friends and family on Thursday evenings in July and hear some of the hottest bands in New England during our Music-by-the-Sea Concert Series. Just bring your beach blanket or chair and leave the cooking to us. You can bring a picnic or enjoy hot off-the-grill fare, snacks and ice cream treats. Adults, visit the "Lobster Trap," where you can enjoy an ice cold beer or a glass of wine. Come relax to a scenic sunset by the shore or dance the night away! All proceeds from the concert series support our environmental education efforts.
Gates open at 5:00 p.m. for dining; music begins at 6:00 p.m.
Ages 13-Adult: $8 for non-members, $4 for SSC members
Children 3-12: $2 for non-members, $1 for SSC members
Under 3: Free
Click here to Purchase Tickets Now! 

*You may not bring alcohol in to the park or concerts.

2011 Concert Schedule
July 7 Islandside: reggae-calypso
July 14 Entrain: rock-blues-calypso-ska-zydeco-jazz-funk, based around the drums and infectious rhythms
July 21 Gnarlemagne: funk-blues-soul-classic rock, dance band
July 28 Jumbo Circus Peanuts: pop-funk-swing- rock, mardis gras style big band
http://www.seacoastsciencecenter.org/events/
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the big rock by the back door
item.name: Music By The Sea: ENTRAIN
